attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There needs to be a substantial increase in the annual recruitment of police officers in order to significantly reduce the crime rate. Police foot patrols need to be visible and regular in order to prevent crime on our streets and in our neighbourhoods. There needs to be a very proactive campaign in every media outlet in order to encourage recruitment into the police. There also needs to be a determined and sustained effort to make the police organisation a worthwhile career choice for aspiring employees and jobseekers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
